alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lemhi County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 6:30AM MST until January 28 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Wintry mix expected. Areas of light rain combined with cold ground temperatures will create pockets of icy conditions. * WHERE...Salmon, Lemhi Pass, Highway 93 Sula to Lost Trail Pass, Highway 28 Tendoy to Lone Pine, Highway 93 Lost Trail Pass to Gibbonsville, Highway 12 from near Lolo to Lolo Pass, and Bannock Pass. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
